Posts.Content: Jul 3, 2013 01:04PM Givemestrength wrote: Hi Lola I had a bone scan and PET scan and they were clear after my alk phosph was high shortly after my double mastectomy surgery. I was very relieved and mo said I will re-do again in three months.. The elevation can be caused by many things.. Good luck and hope all goes well.
